Welcome To My Page

My name is Gulcan Coskun, I am a Chemical Engineer and Junior Web Developer ...

Recently, I have decided to make the career switch from Chemical Engineer to Web Developer.

When I started learning web development, my goal was to create a personal web page, but over time I realized that I love coding.

I am interested in coding because I can easily turn my theoretical knowledge into practice. There are many open resources and application areas to improve my skills in this field.

Moreover, Information technologies have developed day by day and they have made our lives easier. We can easily do almost everything with internet or by using various applications. Thus, It's clear to say there is, and will continue to be, high demand for web developers.

As en engineer, thanks to my background, my analytical skills helped me so much during this period to see patterns, draw conclusions, and find solutions to complex problems.

To make a successful career change and gain experience in this new field, I have prepared some projects and spend most of my free time exploring the latest technological developments in the world of web development.

My career goal is to improve my skills and gain more experience by learning new programing languages.

Apart from all these, I enjoy spending most of my free time outside with my family and visiting different places.

I am very interested in photography, I love nature and nature photography.

    • Synthesising of nanoparticles
    • Immobilization of Candida Antartica Lipaz on nanoparticles

  • Intern in Process engineering

    2011 - 2 months

    KORDSA - Izmit / Turkey

    (Global player in the tire reinforcement and construction sectors as well as in composite technologies)

    Analyzing each production process in the plant in detail, performing detailed mass and energy balances on the current process and preparing technical report.
